QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(p.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, p.provid, p.rxdate, p.num_refills, p.days_supply, p.route, p.quantity_of_dose, p.quantity_per_fill, CASE WHEN p.route = 'Oral' then 4128794 WHEN p.route = 'Intravenous' then 4112421 WHEN p.route = 'Other medication route' then 45956875 WHEN p.route = 'Other injection' then 45956875 WHEN p.route = 'Subcutaneous' then 4139962 WHEN p.route = 'Inhalation' then 45956874 WHEN p.route = 'Topical' then 4231622 WHEN p.route = 'Ophthalmic' then 4157760 WHEN p.route = 'Nasal' then 4128792 WHEN p.route = 'Rectal' then 4115462 WHEN p.route = 'Urinary tract' then 4233974 WHEN p.route = 'Vaginal' then 4136280 ELSE 0 END as route_concept_id, isnull(p.strength, '') + ';' + isnull(p.strength_unit, '') + ';' + isnull(p.dosage_form, '') + ';' + isnull(p.dose_frequency, '') as dose_unit_source_value, p.ndc from {sc}.prescriptions_written as p JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where ndc is not NULL order by cast(replace(p.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
